original: 南陽堵陽人，西晉官員。美姿容，為權臣賈充所屬司空掾，與其女賈午私通，被招為女婿。「偷香」此典故，即源於韓壽。
text: Nanyang Duyang, official of the Western Jin Dynasty. Meizirong, Sikongyu, who belonged to the power minister Jia Chong, had an affair with his daughter Jia Wu and was recruited as a son-in-law. The allusion of "stealing incense" originated from Han Shou.
